name: bootstrap4-utils-extended
description: Extend the Bootstrap 4 Utilities with new classes!
author: Kristian Barrese <kristian.webdeveloper@gmail.com>

scripts.build: node-sass ./b4ue.scss > css/b4ue.css && node-sass --output-style=compressed ./b4ue.scss > css/b4ue.min.temp.css && postcss css/b4ue.min.temp.css > css/b4ue.min.css && del css/b4ue.min.temp.css
